thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by NA

author: NA
title: NA
text:
Great Service! I called them after placing the order as it didn't reflect free shipping. They corrected it immediately. I received my shipment in perfect shape.
One suggestion - Too much packaging with lots of paper. I understand that it is necessary but it might be possible to reduce the paper and save the environment.
